name.title: name
name.description: The name of the shelf whose books we'd like to list.

page_size.title: page_size
page_size.description: Requested page size. Server may return fewer books than requested. If unspecified, server will pick an appropriate default.

page_token.title: page_token
page_token.description: A token identifying a page of results the server should return. Typically, this is the value of [ListBooksResponse.next_page_token][google.example.library.v1.ListBooksResponse.next_page_token]. returned from the previous call to `ListBooks` method.
